events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request for a refund due to receiving the wrong item has been identified and categorized as Refund.
The refund case for the wrong item received has been assigned to support agent Sarah J.
Hello! I'm Sarah, and I understand you received an incorrect item. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund promptly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached the photo showing the incorrect item that arrived instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. No need to return the wrong item.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and for not requiring me to send the item back.
The refund has been processed and should appear on your statement within 3-5 business days. Please contact us if you experience any delays.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can help with.
I did receive the refund today. Thanks so much for your help, really appreciate your support!
We are glad the issue was resolved successfully. Closing the case now. Have a great day!
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey about your recent support experience.
